name: 3dIntracranial
author: AFNI Developers
description: Performs automatic segmentation of intracranial region.

inputs.description: Filename of anat dataset to be segmented
inputs.name: Anat file

inputs.description: Prefix name for file to contain segmented image
inputs.name: Prefix for output file

inputs.description: Minimum voxel intensity limit. Default is internal PDF estimate for lower bound
inputs.name: Minimum voxel intensity

inputs.description: Maximum voxel intensity limit. Default is internal PDF estimate for upper bound
inputs.name: Maximum voxel intensity

inputs.description: Minimum voxel connectivity to enter. Default is 4
inputs.name: Minimum voxel connectivity

inputs.description: Maximum voxel connectivity to leave. Default is 2
inputs.name: Maximum voxel connectivity

inputs.description: Suppress spatial smoothing of segmentation mask
inputs.name: No smoothing flag

inputs.description: Generate functional image mask (complement). Default is to generate anatomical image
inputs.name: Generate functional image mask
